import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import "./App.css" import { Link, Route, Routes } from "react-router-dom" import { NewClimber } from "./pages/NewClimber" import { ClimberList } from "./pages/ClimberList" import { SearchClimber } from "./pages/SearchClimber" import { NotFound } from "./pages/NotFound" import { FoundClimber } from "./pages/FoundClimber" import { AddedClimber } from "./pages/AddedClimber" export default function App() { const [climbers, setClimbers] = useState(() => { const localvalue = localStorage.getItem("CLIMBERS") if(localvalue === null) return [] return JSON.parse(localvalue) }) function addClimber(name,surename,age) { setClimbers(currentClimbers => { return [ ...currentClimbers, { id: climbers?.length ? climbers[climbers.length - 1].id + 1 : 1 , name:name, surename:surename, age:age}, ] }) } function findClimber(id) { let result = climbers.find(climber => climber.id === id) if (!result) return null return result } return ( <>
